languages.text: {n}Священник усмехается.{/n} "К чему нам ее богатства? Вера дает нам все, что нужно. Это она обязана нам — именно {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}друзианская{/g} экспедиция обнаружила ее криосклеп, в котором ее заточила Аспис. Не будь нас, и она до сих пор покоилась бы в ледяном сне".

traits.locale_text: {n}Священник усмехается.{/n} "К чему нам ее богатства? Вера дает нам все, что нужно. Это она обязана нам — именно друзианская экспедиция обнаружила ее крио-склеп, в котором ее заточила Аспис. Не будь нас, и она до сих пор покоилась бы в ледяном сне".

languages.text: {n}He chuckles.{/n} "What good are her riches to us? Faith gives us all we need. It is she who is indebted to us — it was a {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Drusian{/g} expedition that discovered the cryo-vault in which Aspyce had imprisoned her. If it hadn't been for us, she would be resting there still in her frozen slumber."
languages.original_text: {n}Священник усмехается.{/n} "К чему нам ее богатства? Вера дает нам все, что нужно. Это она обязана нам — именно {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}друзианская{/g} экспедиция обнаружила ее криосклеп, в котором ее заточила Аспис. Не будь нас, и она до сих пор покоилась бы в ледяном сне".

traits.locale_text: {n}He chuckles.{/n} "What good are her riches to us? Faith gives us all we need. It is she who is indebted to us — it was a Drusian expedition that discovered the cryo-vault in which Aspyce had imprisoned her. If it weren't for us, she would've been resting there still in her frozen slumber."

{n}He chuckles.{/n} "What good are her riches to us? Faith gives us all we need. It is she who is indebted to us — it was a Drusian expedition that discovered the cryo-vault in which Aspyce had imprisoned her. If it weren't for us, she would've been resting there still in her frozen slumber."

{n}He chuckles.{/n} "What good are her riches to us? Faith gives us all we need. It is she who is indebted to us — it was a Drusian expedition that discovered the cryo-vault in which Aspyce had imprisoned her. If it hadn't been for us, she would be resting there still in her frozen slumber."

{n}He chuckles.{/n} "What good are her riches to us? Faith gives us all we need. It is she who is indebted to us — it was a Drusian expedition that discovered the cryo-vault in which Aspyce had imprisoned her. If it hadn't been for us, she would be resting there still in her frozen slumber."

{n}He chuckles.{/n} "What good are her riches to us? Faith gives us all we need. It is she who is indebted to us — it was a {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Drusian{/g} expedition that discovered the cryo-vault in which Aspyce had imprisoned her. If it hadn't been for us, she would be resting there still in her frozen slumber."

languages.text: {n}他笑了起来。{/n}“她的财富对我们又有什么好处呢？我们需要的一切，都会在信仰之中找到。事实上，是她欠我们的人情。是{g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}德鲁苏斯{/g}教派的探险队找到了她的冷冻舱，她被阿斯拜丝囚禁其中。如果不是我们，她现在可能还在那冰冷的舱室中沉睡呢。”
languages.original_text: {n}He chuckles.{/n} "What good are her riches to us? Faith gives us all we need. It is she who is indebted to us — it was a {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Drusian{/g} expedition that discovered the cryo-vault in which Aspyce had imprisoned her. If it hadn't been for us, she would be resting there still in her frozen slumber."

traits.locale_text: {n}他笑了起来。{/n}“她的财富对我们又有什么好处呢？我们需要的一切，都会在信仰之中找到。事实上，是她欠我们的人情。是{g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}德鲁苏斯{/g}教派的探险队找到了她的冷冻舱，她被阿斯拜丝囚禁其中。如果不是我们，她现在可能还在那冰冷的舱室中沉睡呢。”

languages.text: {n}Lanza una carcajada.{/n} «¿Qué bien nos hacen sus riquezas? La fe nos da todo lo que necesitamos, es ella la que está en deuda con nosotros. La criocámara en la que Aspyce la encerró fue descubierta por una expedición {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}drusiana{/g}. De no haber sido por nosotros, seguiría allí, descansando en su cámara congelada».
languages.original_text: {n}He chuckles.{/n} "What good are her riches to us? Faith gives us all we need. It is she who is indebted to us — it was a {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Drusian{/g} expedition that discovered the cryo-vault in which Aspyce had imprisoned her. If it hadn't been for us, she would be resting there still in her frozen slumber."

traits.locale_text: {n}Lanza una carcajada.{/n} «¿Qué bien nos hacen sus riquezas? La fe nos da todo lo que necesitamos, es ella la que está en deuda con nosotros. La criocámara en la que Aspyce la encerró fue descubierta por una expedición {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}drusiana{/g}. De no haber sido por nosotros, seguiría allí, descansando en su cámara congelada».

languages.text: {n}彼はクスクスと笑う。{/n}「彼女の富を得たところで何になるのです？必要なものは信仰が与えてくれます。むしろ、彼女の方が我々に借りがあるのです。アスパイスが彼女を捕らえていた凍保管庫を発見したのは、{g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}ドルスス{/g}教の探索隊です。我らがいなければ、彼女は今でも凍てつく眠りの中にいたことでしょう」
languages.original_text: {n}He chuckles.{/n} "What good are her riches to us? Faith gives us all we need. It is she who is indebted to us — it was a {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Drusian{/g} expedition that discovered the cryo-vault in which Aspyce had imprisoned her. If it hadn't been for us, she would be resting there still in her frozen slumber."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼はクスクスと笑う。{/n}「彼女の富を得たところで何になるのです？必要なものは信仰が与えてくれます。むしろ、彼女の方が我々に借りがあるのです。アスパイスが彼女を捕らえていた凍保管庫を発見したのは、{g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}ドルスス{/g}教の探索隊です。我らがいなければ、彼女は今でも凍てつく眠りの中にいたことでしょう」

languages.text: {n}Er kichert.{/n} "Was nützen uns ihre Reichtümer? Der Glaube gibt uns alles, was wir brauchen. Sie schuldet vielmehr uns etwas – es war eine Expedition der {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Drusianer{/g}, die das Cryo-Grab entdeckte, in das Aspyce sie gesperrt hatte. Ohne uns würde sie immer noch dort in ihrem eisigen Schlummer ruhen."
languages.original_text: {n}He chuckles.{/n} "What good are her riches to us? Faith gives us all we need. It is she who is indebted to us — it was a {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Drusian{/g} expedition that discovered the cryo-vault in which Aspyce had imprisoned her. If it hadn't been for us, she would be resting there still in her frozen slumber."

traits.locale_text: {n}Er kichert.{/n} "Was nützen uns ihre Reichtümer? Der Glaube gibt uns alles, was wir brauchen. Sie schuldet vielmehr uns etwas – es war eine Expedition der {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Drusianer{/g}, die das Cryo-Grab entdeckte, in das Aspyce sie gesperrt hatte. Ohne uns würde sie immer noch dort in ihrem eisigen Schlummer ruhen."

languages.text: {n}Il rit.{/n} « Que peuvent bien nous apporter ses richesses ? La foi nous accorde tout ce dont nous avons besoin. C'est plutôt elle qui a une dette envers nous : c'est une expédition {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}drusienne{/g} qui a découvert la chambre cryogénique dans laquelle Aspyce l'avait emprisonnée. Sans nous, elle y serait toujours endormie. »
languages.original_text: {n}He chuckles.{/n} "What good are her riches to us? Faith gives us all we need. It is she who is indebted to us — it was a {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Drusian{/g} expedition that discovered the cryo-vault in which Aspyce had imprisoned her. If it hadn't been for us, she would be resting there still in her frozen slumber."

traits.locale_text: {n}Il rit.{/n} « Que peuvent bien nous apporter ses richesses ? La foi nous accorde tout ce dont nous avons besoin. C'est plutôt elle qui a une dette envers nous : c'est une expédition {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}drusienne{/g} qui a découvert la chambre cryogénique dans laquelle Aspyce l'avait emprisonnée. Sans nous, elle y serait toujours endormie. »

languages.text: {n}Yüksek sesle gülüyor.{/n} "Onun malının mülkünün bize ne faydası var ki? İnanç bize istediğimiz her şeyi verir. Bilakis o bize borçludur. Aspyce'nin onu mahkûm ettiği kriyomahzen keşfeden, {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Drususçu{/g} kâşiflerdi. Biz olmasaydık hâlâ donmuş hâlde uyuyor olurdu."
languages.original_text: {n}He chuckles.{/n} "What good are her riches to us? Faith gives us all we need. It is she who is indebted to us — it was a {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Drusian{/g} expedition that discovered the cryo-vault in which Aspyce had imprisoned her. If it hadn't been for us, she would be resting there still in her frozen slumber."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yüksek sesle gülüyor.{/n} "Onun zenginlikleri bizim için ne anlam ifade edebilir ki? İnanç bize istediğimiz her şeyi verir. Bize borçlu olan o bilakis, Aspyce'nin onu mahkûm ettiği kriyojenik mahzeni keşfeden {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Drususçu{/g} kâşifleriydi. Biz olmasaydık hâlâ donmuş hâlde uyuyor olurdu."
